title: so many afk/trolls in ranked!
body:
Hi everyone

In most of my games I have an afk or an intentional feeder or a troll leaving a lane open ect its really frustrating

More likely to get a proper game in normals. Winning a ranked game has now become a coin toss on who doesn't get a screwed up teammate.

I am really annoyed lost a game I was doing real well in because ADC doesn't stay bot lane and another because jungle afks 1/2 the game.
